text: Gei dono ehoo ga helekai gi Saul, “Nnoo malaa, ma iai taane haga madagu e noho i lodo di waahale deenei, e hagalabagau huoloo i baahi o nia daangada, idimaa, ana helekai ala ma ga helekai ai le e kila huogodoo. Gidaua gaa hula gi baahi o mee, holongo mee ga hagi mai gi gidaua di gowaa dela e iai nia ‘donkey’.”
